description:
See more like this: http://lon.tv/ww and my latest videos at http://lon.tv/latest - In a Twitter post the other day, the YouTube liaison admitted what we've known all along: YouTube effectively shadow unsubscribes you from channels if you miss a few videos. I also talk about how the subs tab could be made better. Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro & Supporter Thank Yous
00:46 - YouTube Liason on Subscriptions
05:17 - Thumbnail Impressions vs. Subscribers
06:58 - Desktop Subscriber Tab 
08:17 - Mobile Subscription Tab
10:36 - TV Interface Subscription Tab
12:11 - How I use an RSS Reader as an alternative to the subs tab
13:55 - Topic Based Sorting
14:18 - My Email list
15:48 - Conclusion

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists! 
Weekly Breakdown of Posted Videos:  - https://lon.tv/email
Daily Email From My Blog Posts! https://lon.tv/digest

See my second channel for supplementary content : http://lon.tv/extras

Follow me on Amazon t
title: YouTube Admits Subscriptions Don't Matter All That Much...
